format: A data frame with 310,388 observations on the following 6 variables.

parameters.e143: an attitude about immigration policy in the World Values Survey
parameters.s003: the World Values Survey country code
parameters.uid: a unique identifier for the survey respondent

reference:
1 = "let anyone come". 2 = "as long as jobs are available". 3 = "strict limits".
4 = "Prohibit people from coming" for the e143 variable. See ?wvs_ccodes for
more information about naming/identifying countries.
title: Attitudes about Immigration in the World Values Survey
description:
Description
A data set on attitudes about immigration for all observations in
the third to sixth wave of the World Values Survey. I use these
data for in-class illustration.
